Stand a chance to win homechoice bedding Competition rules
    1. The Promoter
  1. HomeChoice (Pty) Limited (“HomeChoice”, “we”, “our” or “us”) is the promoter of this competition in conjunction with FinChoice, a division of HomeChoice and FoneChoice, a division of HomeChoice.
  2. HomeChoice owns and manages the website located at www.homechoice.co.za (“website”) and the mobi-page at m.homechoice.co.za (“mobi-page”).
  3. By entering this competition, you agree that these competition rules will apply to you and bind you to the extent permitted in law. These rules, should they require interpretation, will be interpreted in accordance with applicable South African laws.
  4. You may obtain a copy of these competition rules from competitions@homechoice.co.za or from the website at www.homechoice.co.za/official-rules.
    1. How to enter
  5. To be automatically entered into the competition, you must:
    1. Go to homechoice.co.za and choose the homechoice bedding your mom will love. Share it on the Homechoice FaceBook page- tell us why you chose that Homechoice product and tag homechoice
  6. The competition runs from 25 April 2021 00:00:00 to 8 May 2021 23:59:59 on the homechoice Facebook page.
  7. Entry into the competition is limited to 1 entry per person. The promoter reserves the right, at its sole discretion, to amend the rules relating to the number of entries per person depending on the sales channel utilised.
  8. Your entries must reach us before the closing time of the competition specified in clause 6 above. Please note that entry may be through an electronic platform. Although HomeChoice will take all reasonable steps, it will not be liable for any technical problems or any lost, delayed or incorrectly received entries.
    1. The Prize
  9. There will be 1 winner who will receive a homechoice bedding set (pattern, size and colours may vary) (“the Prize”).
  10. The Prize shall not be redeemable for cash and is not transferable, unless we agree otherwise at our discretion. We may, at our discretion, decide to substitute the Prize with similar goods of a similar value.
    1. The Draw
  11. The winners will be selected by random draw, and the process will be overseen by an independent attorney or accountant who will also report on the competition in accordance with all relevant regulatory requirements.
  12. In order to qualify as a winner, you must:
    1. be 18 years or older
    2. not be under debt review or in the process to apply for debt review;
    3. not be a director, member, partner, agent, employee or consultant of the promoter or any supplier of goods or services in connection with the competition or any other person who directly or indirectly controls or is controlled by the promoter;
    4. not be the spouse, life partner, business partner or associate, or the natural or adopted parent, child or sibling of any of the persons specified in (c);
    5. be up to date with all accounts/credit agreements with HomeChoice
  13. The prize draw will take place within fourteen business days after the closing date of the competition. If the winner’s account is in default at any time from the time of entry to the time of the draw, the winner will immediately be disqualified, and another winner will be selected.
  14. The winner/s will be contacted via email and/or SMS and/or telephone at which point arrangements will be made for the winner/s to receive his/her/their Prize(s). If HomeChoice is not able to contact the winner despite reasonable attempts within 5 days, it reserves the right to disqualify the winner and select an alternative winner, in which event the initial winner will have no recourse against HomeChoice. Winners, once successfully contacted, will also be announced on the HomeChoice and FinChoice websites and mobi-pages.
    1. General
  15. Winner/s may be taxed in terms of applicable tax legislation, and participants who require clarity as to the tax implications hereof should seek a directive from the relevant revenue service/authority.
  16. HomeChoice will use the winner’s name/s and/or photograph/s in any promotional and/or advertising material for the purposes of HomeChoice marketing, unless the winner objects to such use in writing.
  17. The winner will be required to sign a winner’s declaration form and other related documentation as required by law and will also need to provide proof of identity. The winner may not receive the Prize if it is against the law for the winner to receive the Prize.
  18. We may require winners to provide us with such additional information that we may reasonably require in order to process and facilitate their acceptance and/or use of a prize.
  19. The promoter reserves the right, at its sole discretion, to cancel or suspend any competition or change the rules if errors need to be corrected or to prevent any party from being unduly prejudiced or favoured at the reasonable discretion of the promoter.
  20. PLEASE NOTE THAT BY ENTERING INTO THE COMPETITION, YOU MAY STAND A CHANCE TO WIN A PRIZE AND THERE ARE NO GUARANTEES.
  21. If a competition or promotion is cancelled or suspended due to any reasons, all participants or entrants agree to waive any rights that they may have in terms of the competition and acknowledge that they have no recourse against HomeChoice, their employees, agents, partners, suppliers, sponsors or promoters.
  22. Any violation or attempt to violate any of the above rules will result in the immediate disqualification of the transgressor.
  23. The Prize is provided “as is” and HomeChoice disclaims liability, however arising out of your use of the Prize.
  24. You hereby indemnify and hold harmless HomeChoice (including its directors, employees, members, independent contractors, agents, consultants, sub-contractors and other representatives) from any and all direct, indirect or consequential loss or damages suffered as a result of any action or omission relating to this competition and/or the award of any prize.
Buy blankets worth R599 or more and stand a chance to win your order free Competition rules
    1. The Promoter
  1. HomeChoice (Pty) Limited (“HomeChoice”, “we”, “our” or “us”) is the promoter of this competition.
  2. HomeChoice owns and manages the website located at www.homechoice.co.za (“website”)
  3. By entering this competition, you agree that these competition rules will apply to you and bind you to the extent permitted in law. These rules, should they require interpretation, will be interpreted in accordance with applicable South African laws.
  4. You may obtain a copy of these competition rules from competitions@homechoice.co.za or from the website at www.homechoice.co.za/official-rules.
    1. How to enter
  5. To be automatically entered into the competition, you must:
    1. Be a Nursery customer called by a homechoice telemarketing agent,
    2. Purchase any blankets worth R599 or more during the promotional period.
  6. The competition runs from 25 April 2021 00:00:00 to 8 May 2021 23:59:59 via the homechoice call centre.
  7. Entry into the competition is limited to 1 entry per person, unless entries are received via the website or mobi-page, in which case a maximum of 2 entries per person are allowed. The promoter reserves the right, at its sole discretion, to amend the rules relating to the number of entries per person depending on the sales channel utilised.
  8. Your entries must reach us before the closing time of the competition specified in clause 6 above. Please note that entry may be through an electronic platform. Although homechoice will take all reasonable steps, it will not be liable for any technical problems or any lost, delayed or incorrectly received entries.
    1. The Prize
  9. There will be 14 (fourteen) winners who will not be billed for the despatched order which entered them into the draw (“the Prize”). That is, they will win their order for free. If the winning customer has paid cash for the order, they will be reimbursed for the amount paid (“the Prize”).
  10. The Prize shall not be redeemable for cash and is not transferable, unless we agree otherwise at our discretion. We may, at our discretion, decide to substitute the Prize with similar goods of a similar value.
    1. The Draw
  11. The winners will be selected by random draw and the process will be overseen by an independent attorney or accountant who will also report on the competition in accordance with all relevant regulatory requirements.
  12. In order to qualify as a winner, you must:
    1. be 18 years or older
    2. not be under debt review or in the process to apply for debt review;
    3. not be a director, member, partner, agent, employee or consultant of the promoter or any supplier of goods or services in connection with the competition or any other person who directly or indirectly controls or is controlled by the promoter;
    4. not be the spouse, life partner, business partner or associate, or the natural or adopted parent, child or sibling of any of the persons specified in (c);
    5. be up to date with all accounts/credit agreements with HomeChoice
  13. The prize draw will take place on the Thursday after the closing date of the competition. If the winner’s account is in default at any time from the time of entry to the time of the draw, the winner will immediately be disqualified, and another winner will be selected.
  14. The winner/s will be contacted via email and/or SMS and/or telephone at which point arrangements will be made for the winner/s to receive his/her/their Prize(s). If HomeChoice is not able to contact the winner despite reasonable attempts within 5 days, it reserves the right to disqualify the winner and select an alternative winner, in which event the initial winner will have no recourse against HomeChoice. Winners, once successfully contacted, will also be announced on the HomeChoice website.
    1. General
  15. Winners may be taxed in terms of applicable tax legislation, and participants who require clarity as to the tax implications hereof should seek a directive from the relevant revenue service/authority.
  16. HomeChoice will use the winner’s name/s and/or photograph/s in any promotional and/or advertising material for the purposes of HomeChoice marketing, unless the winner objects to such use in writing.
  17. The winner will be required to sign a winner’s declaration form and other related documentation as required by law and will also need to provide proof of identity. The winner may not receive the Prize if it is against the law for the winner to receive the Prize.
  18. We may require winners to provide us with such additional information that we may reasonably require in order to process and facilitate their acceptance and/or use of a prize.
  19. The promoter reserves the right, at its sole discretion, to cancel or suspend any competition or change the rules if errors need to be corrected or to prevent any party from being unduly prejudiced or favoured at the reasonable discretion of the promoter.
  20. PLEASE NOTE THAT BY ENTERING INTO THE COMPETITION, YOU MAY STAND A CHANCE TO WIN A PRIZE AND THERE ARE NO GUARANTEES.
  21. If a competition or promotion is cancelled or suspended due to any reasons, all participants or entrants agree to waive any rights that they may have in terms of the competition and acknowledge that they have no recourse against HomeChoice, their employees, agents, partners, suppliers, sponsors or promoters.
  22. Any violation or attempt to violate any of the above rules will result in the immediate disqualification of the transgressor.
  23. The Prize is provided “as is” and HomeChoice disclaims liability, however arising out of your use of the Prize.
  24. You hereby indemnify and hold harmless HomeChoice (including its directors, employees, members, independent contractors, agents, consultants, sub-contractors and other representatives) from any and all direct, indirect or consequential loss or damages suffered as a result of any action or omission relating to this competition and/or the award of any prize.

Showrooms Refer a Friend Promotion Terms and Conditions
  1. HomeChoice (Pty) Limited (“HomeChoice”, “we”, “our” or “us”) is the promoter of this promotional offer.
  2. HomeChoice owns and manages the website located at www.homechoice.co.za (“website”).
  3. These terms regulate the promotion and will be interpreted in accordance with applicable South African laws.
  4. You may obtain a copy of these terms from the website at www.homechoice.co.za/official-rules or from competitions@homechoice.co.za.
  5. The promotion runs from 15 April 2021 00:00:00 to 15 May 23:59:59 in all HomeChoice showrooms country wide.
  6. In terms of the promotion, customers who:
    1. Bring a friend with them to any of our showrooms to open a HomeChoice account, will receive R200 off with every order over R1999 or more that is placed during the promotional period AND that is subsequently successfully dispatched.
  7. The promotion applies to all products.
  8. The promotion does not exclude any products.
  9. The benefit attached to this promotion shall not be redeemable for cash and is not transferable, unless we agree otherwise, in our discretion.
  10. HomeChoice reserves the right to replace the benefit with a benefit of a similar value should this be required due to items being out of stock or, for any other reason whatsoever at their sole discretion.
  11. Customers who return their order for any reason will forfeit their right to the benefit and must return any order attached in its original packaging and without being used.
  12. Customers who do not return a gift dispatched with their order in terms of clause 11, or who do not return it in its original packaging and without being used, agree to be charged for the normal purchase price of the gift, which will be debited against the customer’s HomeChoice account on notice. In this instance, the gift will be treated as a credit purchase on the date as specified in the notice. The standard HomeChoice credit terms and conditions, including credit costs, will apply to it.
  13. A customer will forfeit his or her right to the benefit associated with the promotion if he or she is (a) under debt review or in the process to apply for debt review; or (b) a director, member, partner, agent, employee or consultant of the promoter or any supplier of goods or services in connection with the promotional offer, or any other person who directly or indirectly controls or is controlled by the promoter; and/or (c) the spouse, life partner, business partner or associate, or the natural or adopted parent, child, or sibling, of any of the persons specified in (b).
  14. The promoter reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to cancel or suspend any promotional offer if errors need to be corrected, or to prevent any party from being unduly prejudiced or favoured in the discretion of the promotor.
  15. If the promotional offer is cancelled or suspended due to any reasons, all qualifying customers agree to waive any rights that they may have in terms of the promotional offer and acknowledge that they have no recourse against HomeChoice, their employees, agents, partners, suppliers, sponsors or promoters.
  16. Any violation or attempt to violate any of the promotional offer terms will result in the immediate disqualification of the transgressor.
  17. The benefit is provided “as is” and HomeChoice disclaims liability however arising out of your use of the gift/benefit.
  18. You hereby indemnify and hold harmless HomeChoice (including its directors, employees, members, independent contractors, agents, consultants, sub-contractors and other representatives) from any and all direct, indirect or consequential loss or damages suffered as a result of any action or omission relating to this promotional offer and/or the award of any gift/benefit.

    1. Purchase any cash-only item/s to the value of R800 or more, specified in clause 7, will receive free delivery with every cash order placed during the promotional period AND that is subsequently successfully dispatched.

    1. All HomeChoice products

In this instance, the gift will be treated as a credit purchase on the date as specified in the notice. The standard HomeChoice credit terms and conditions, including credit costs, will apply to it.
  12. A customer will forfeit his or her right to the benefit associated with the promotion if he or she is (a) under debt review or in the process to apply for debt review; or (b) a director, member, partner, agent, employee or consultant of the promoter or any supplier of goods or services in connection with the promotional offer, or any other person who directly or indirectly controls or is controlled by the promoter; and/or (c) the spouse, life partner, business partner or associate, or the natural or adopted parent, child, or sibling, of any of the persons specified in (b).
  13. The promoter reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to cancel or suspend any promotional offer if errors need to be corrected, or to prevent any party from being unduly prejudiced or favoured in the discretion of the promotor.
  14. If the promotional offer is cancelled or suspended due to any reasons, all qualifying customers agree to waive any rights that they may have in terms of the promotional offer and acknowledge that they have no recourse against HomeChoice, their employees, agents, partners, suppliers, sponsors or promoters.

STANDARD RULES FOR HOMECHOICE COMPETITIONS
1. The promoter is homechoice (Pty) Ltd ("the Promoter").
2. The promotional competition is open to all customers whose accounts are in good standing, who are South African residents, or residents of Namibia, Botswana, Swaziland, Zambia and Lesotho, who are in possession of a valid identity document, except any director, member, partner, employee, agent or consultant of the Promoter, the marketing service providers or any person who directly or indirectly controls or is controlled by these entities, including their spouses, life partners, business partners or immediate family members.
3. All participants indemnify the company against any and all claims of any nature whatsoever arising out of and/or from their participation in this competition. The company is not liable for any defect in the prizes. The company reserves the right to substitute prizes with any other prize of comparable commercial value.
4. Entries that are unclear, illegible or contain errors will be declared invalid.
5. The company will use reasonable efforts to contact grand prize winners during working hours (between 8am and 5pm) either telephonically or via e-mail on the contact number or e-mail address as provided by the winners. homechoice will endeavour to contact the potential prize winner within two weeks from draw date.
6. The potential prize winner may be required to provide or verify their name, surname, ID number, telephone number and physical address with a homechoice representative. The potential prize winner is not an actual winner until his / her submission is validated and satisfies the qualifying criterion set by the promoter. If a potential prize winner does not meet the eligibility requirements, the prize will be forfeited.
7. If the company is unable to reach any person after drawing his/her entry for whatsoever reason, such person will be disqualified and the draw of a replacement entry shall take place in the same manner as the first draw.
8. The Promoter shall not be responsible for any lost, damaged or delayed entries for any reason whatsoever. Proof of sending will not be accepted as proof of receipt.
9. The Promoter reserves the right to disqualify any claim if fraud or cheating is suspected, including without limitation, through the manipulation of code or otherwise falsifying data.
10. NOTE: Any attempt to use multiple e-mail accounts or other tactics to enter more than the stated limit may result in disqualification and all associated entries will be void. Entries generated by script, macro, bot, commercial contest subscription, incentives or other means not sponsored by the Promoter, entering service sites or any other automated means and entries by any means that subvert the entry process or do not conform to the terms or spirit of these competition rules, will void the entry and may disqualify the entrant.
11. The company may require winners to complete an information disclosure document and/or indemnification to ensure compliance with these rules and the Consumer Protection Act 68 of 2008. Should any winner refuse or be unable to comply, such winner will be deemed to have rejected the prize.
12. The company may require winners be identified and/or photographed and the photographs published in printed or electronic media. The winners will be given the opportunity to decline to the publication of their images and to participate in marketing material in so far as it relates to the competition.
13. The Promoter shall have the right to change or terminate the promotional competition and without notice, for any reason which the Promoter reasonably deems necessary.
14. In the event of such change or termination, all participants agree to waive any rights that they have in respect of this promotional competition and acknowledge that they will have no recourse against the Promoter or its agents.
15. Neither the Promoter, its agents, its associated companies, nor any directors, officers or employees of such, shall be liable for any loss or damage, whether direct, indirect, consequential or otherwise arising from any cause whatsoever, which may be suffered by the participant.
16. Participation in the promotion constitutes acceptance of the promotional rules and participants agree to abide by the rules, which will be interpreted by the company’s appointed judges, whose decision regarding any dispute will be final and binding.
17. In the event that the prize is not available despite the Promoter's reasonable endeavours to procure the prize, the Promoter reserves the right to substitute prizes of equal value.
18. For prizes other than cash, unless it is specifically provided for and allowed in the marketing material, the prize(s) are neither transferable nor redeemable for cash. Prizes are subject to availability and the company may substitute prizes for alternative products or services of similar value.
19. The Promoter assumes no liability whatsoever for any entry that has been omitted from participation for any reason whatsoever. The Promoter is not liable for any technical failures affecting the participation and/or voucher redemption process of the promotion.
20. The winners’ details (name and home town only) will be available after the draw date, on receipt of a stamped, self-addressed envelope. Write to The Prize Draw Administrator, Pvt Bag X123, Claremont 7735. Prize Winners’ names, locations and photos may also appear on the homechoice website and mobisite, and Facebook, Twitter and Pinterest pages for up to 12 months. Winners may refuse to have their photos shown.
21. All entries received via the homechoice Facebook page are subject to above rules.
22. A copy of these rules can be obtained at no cost to the participant from The Prize Draw Administrator at Pvt Bag X123, Claremont 7735 or 78 Main Road Wynberg, Cape Town.
23. This draw is run in accordance with the Consumer Protection Act.

The Promoters
How to enter
The Prize
The Draw
General
  1. HomeChoice (Pty) Limited (“HomeChoice”) is the promoter of this competition in conjunction with FinChoice Africa Limited (both referred to as “FinChoice ”) (collectively referred to as “the Promoters”, “we”, “our” or “us”).
  2. HomeChoice owns and manages the website located at www.homechoice.co.za (“website”) and the mobi-site at m.homechoice.co.za (“mobi-site”).
  3. FinChoice owns and manages the website located at www.finchoice.co.za (“website”) and the mobi-site at www.finchoice.mobi (“mobi-site”).
  4. By entering this competition, you agree that these competition rules will apply to you and bind you to the extent permitted in law. These rules, should they require interpretation, will be interpreted in accordance with applicable South African laws.
  5. You may obtain a copy of these competition rules as follows:
    • HomeChoice customers: from competitions@homechoice.co.za or from the website at www.homechoice.co.za/official-rules.
    • FinChoice customers: from the mobi-site www.finchoice.mobi/Home/Terms section Grand Prize Draw.
  6. To be automatically entered into the competition:
    • HomeChoice Customers:
      1. You will receive 1 (one) entry for every successfully placed order during the competition period, provided that the order is subsequently successfully dispatched.
      2. For bedding orders successfully placed via the HomeChoice website you will receive 2 (two) entries, provided that the order is subsequently successfully dispatched.
      3. Pay an extra instalment on your account during the competition period and you will receive 2 (two) entries to the draw, provided that your account is up to date and not in arrears.
      4. If your account has been in arrears for 1 (one) month or less, and you settle the full arrears amount during the competition period, you will receive 1 (one) entry into the draw.
      5. Give us your consent to digitally market to you and you will receive 1 (one) entry into the draw
    • FinChoice Customers who:
      1. Successfully take a New Loan or Reloan, you will receive 1 (one) entry into the draw.
      2. Successfully activate a MobiMoney facility, you will receive 1 (one) entry into the draw.
      3. Successfully withdraw from your MobiMoney facility, you will receive 1 (one) entry into the draw.
  7. The competition runs from 26 February 2021 00:00:00 to 25 March 2021 23:59:59 on all HomeChoice and FinChoice channels.
  8. Entry into the competition:
    1. HomeChoice Customers: are limited to 5 entries per person, unless entries are received via the website or mobi-site in which case a maximum of 10 entries per person are allowed.
    2. FinChoice Customers: are limited to 5 entries per person, unless entries are received via the website or mobi-site in which case a maximum of 10 entries per person are allowed.
    The Promoters reserve the right, in their sole discretion, to amend the rules relating to the number of entries per person depending on the channel of entry utilised.
  9. Your entries must reach us before the closing time of the competition specified in clause 8 above. Please note that entry may be through an electronic platform. Although the Promoters will take all reasonable steps, we will not be liable for any technical problems or any lost, delayed or incorrectly received entries.
  10. There will be 1 (one) winner who will receive R1 000 000 (one million rands only) (“the Prize”) which will be paid out in five equal disbursements of R200,000 (two hundred thousand rand) over a 5-year period (the "Prize"), the first payment to be made in April 2021 and annually thereafter.
  11. The Prize shall not be redeemable for any other item and is not transferable, unless we agree otherwise in our discretion. We may, in our discretion, decide to substitute the Prize with goods of a similar value.
  12. The winner will be selected by random draw and the process will be overseen by an independent attorney or accountant who will also report on the competition in accordance with all relevant regulatory requirements.
  13. In order to qualify as a winner, you must:
    1. be 18 years or older
    2. not be under debt review or in the process of applying for debt review;
    3. not be a director, member, partner, agent, employee or consultant of the Promoters or any supplier of goods or services in connection with the competition, or any other person who directly or indirectly controls or is controlled by the Promoters;
    4. not be the spouse, life partner, business partner or associate, or the natural or adopted parent, child, or sibling, of any of the persons specified in (c);
    5. be up to date with all accounts/credit agreements with HomeChoice and FinChoice
  14. The prize draw will take place within 30 business days after the closing date of the competition. If the winner’s account is in default at any time from the time of entry to the time of the draw, the winner will immediately be disqualified and the prize will be awarded to an alternative winner. If none of the winner(s) or alternative winners drawn qualify to receive the Prize, we may conduct a new draw at our discretion.
  15. The winner will be contacted via e-mail and/or sms and/or telephone at which point arrangements will be made for the winner to receive his/her Prize. If the Promoters are not able to contact the winner within 5 (five) working days, despite reasonable attempts, we reserve the right to disqualify the winner and award the Prize to an alternative winner, in which event the initial winner will have no recourse against the Promoters. The winner, once successfully contacted, will also be announced on the HomeChoice and/or FinChoice websites and mobi-sites.
  16. The winner may be taxed in terms of applicable tax legislation and participants who require clarity as to the tax implications hereof should seek a directive from the relevant revenue service/authority.
  17. The Promoters will use the winner’s name and/or photograph/s in any promotional and/or advertising material for the purposes of the Promoters’ marketing, unless the Winner objects to such use in writing.
  18. The winner will be required to sign a winner’s declaration form and other related documentation as required by law and will also need to provide proof of identity before receiving the Prize. The winner may not receive the Prize if it is against the law for the winner to receive the Prize.
  19. We may require the winner to provide us with such additional information that we may reasonably require in order to process and facilitate their acceptance and/or use of the Prize.
  20. The Promoters reserve the right, in their sole discretion, to cancel or suspend any competition or change the rules if errors need to be corrected, or to prevent any party from being unduly prejudiced or favoured in the reasonable discretion of the Promoters.
  21. PLEASE NOTE THAT BY ENTERING INTO THE COMPETITION YOU MAY STAND A CHANCE TO WIN A PRIZE AND THERE ARE NO GUARANTEES.
  22. If a competition or promotion is cancelled or suspended due to any reasons, all participants or entrants agree to waive any rights that they may have in terms of the competition and acknowledge that they have no recourse against the Promoters, their employees, agents, partners, suppliers, sponsors or promoters.
  23. Any violation or attempt to violate any of the above rules will result in the immediate disqualification of the transgressor.
  24. The Prize is provided “as is” and the Promoters disclaim liability, however, arising out of your use of the Prize.
  25. You hereby indemnify and hold harmless the Promoters (including theirs directors, employees, members, independent contractors, agents, consultants, sub-contractors and other representatives) from any and all direct, indirect or consequential loss or damages suffered as a result of any action or omission relating to this competition and/or the award of the Prize.

  4. You may obtain a copy of these competition rules from competitions@homechoice.co.za or from the website at www.homechoice.co.za/official-rules.
  5. To be automatically entered into the competition, you must:
    1. Follow our page, sign up via the entry form, and tell us who you would have tea with. This entry form is available on our Facebook page from our website.
  6. The competition runs from 8 February 2021 00:00:00 to 12 February 2021 23:59:59 on all HomeChoice sales channels.
  7. Entry into the competition is limited to 1 entry per person. The promoter reserves the right, at its sole discretion, to amend the rules relating to the number of entries per person depending on the sales channel utilised.
  8. Your entries must reach us before the closing time of the competition specified in clause 6 above. Please note that entry may be through an electronic platform. Although HomeChoice will take all reasonable steps, it will not be liable for any technical problems or any lost, delayed or incorrectly received entries.
  9. There will be 3 winners who will receive a Flora Dinnerware Set worth R1699 (“the Prize”).
  10. The Prize shall not be redeemable for cash and is not transferable, unless we agree otherwise at our discretion. We may, at our discretion, decide to substitute the Prize with similar goods of a similar value.
  11. The winners will be selected by random draw, and the process will be overseen by an independent attorney or accountant who will also report on the competition in accordance with all relevant regulatory requirements.
  12. In order to qualify as a winner, you must:
    1. be 18 years or older
    2. not be under debt review or in the process to apply for debt review;
    3. not be a director, member, partner, agent, employee or consultant of the promoter or any supplier of goods or services in connection with the competition or any other person who directly or indirectly controls or is controlled by the promoter;
    4. not be the spouse, life partner, business partner or associate, or the natural or adopted parent, child or sibling of any of the persons specified in (c);
    5. be up to date with all accounts/credit agreements with HomeChoice
  13. The prize draw will take place within fourteen business days after the closing date of the competition. If the winner’s account is in default at any time from the time of entry to the time of the draw, the winner will immediately be disqualified, and another winner will be selected.
  14. The winner/s will be contacted via email and/or SMS and/or telephone at which point arrangements will be made for the winner/s to receive his/her/their Prize(s). If HomeChoice is not able to contact the winner despite reasonable attempts within 5 days, it reserves the right to disqualify the winner and select an alternative winner, in which event the initial winner will have no recourse against HomeChoice. Winners, once successfully contacted, will also be announced on the HomeChoice and FinChoice websites and mobi-pages.
  15. Winner/s may be taxed in terms of applicable tax legislation, and participants who require clarity as to the tax implications hereof should seek a directive from the relevant revenue service/authority.
  16. HomeChoice will use the winner’s name/s and/or photograph/s in any promotional and/or advertising material for the purposes of HomeChoice marketing, unless the winner objects to such use in writing.
  17. The winner will be required to sign a winner’s declaration form and other related documentation as required by law and will also need to provide proof of identity. The winner may not receive the Prize if it is against the law for the winner to receive the Prize.
  18. We may require winners to provide us with such additional information that we may reasonably require in order to process and facilitate their acceptance and/or use of a prize.
  19. The promoter reserves the right, at its sole discretion, to cancel or suspend any competition or change the rules if errors need to be corrected or to prevent any party from being unduly prejudiced or favoured at the reasonable discretion of the promoter.
  20. PLEASE NOTE THAT BY ENTERING INTO THE COMPETITION, YOU MAY STAND A CHANCE TO WIN A PRIZE AND THERE ARE NO GUARANTEES.
  21. If a competition or promotion is cancelled or suspended due to any reasons, all participants or entrants agree to waive any rights that they may have in terms of the competition and acknowledge that they have no recourse against HomeChoice, their employees, agents, partners, suppliers, sponsors or promoters.
  22. Any violation or attempt to violate any of the above rules will result in the immediate disqualification of the transgressor.
  23. The Prize is provided “as is” and HomeChoice disclaims liability, however arising out of your use of the Prize.
  24. You hereby indemnify and hold harmless HomeChoice (including its directors, employees, members, independent contractors, agents, consultants, sub-contractors and other representatives) from any and all direct, indirect or consequential loss or damages suffered as a result of any action or omission relating to this competition and/or the award of any prize.

General
  1. HomeChoice (Pty) Limited (“HomeChoice”, “we”, “our” or “us”) is the promoter of this competition.
  2. HomeChoice owns and manages the website located at www.homechoice.co.za (“website”) and the mobi-page at m.homechoice.co.za (“mobi-page”).
  3. By entering this competition, you agree that these competition rules will apply to you and bind you to the extent permitted in law. These rules, should they require interpretation, will be interpreted in accordance with applicable South African laws.
  4. You may obtain a copy of these competition rules from competitions@homechoice.co.za or from the website at www.homechoice.co.za/official-rules.
  5. To be automatically entered into the competition, you must:
    1. Comment on our Facebook post and let us know how HomeCchoice helps you make the PERFECT breakfast. , and you could win the Mellerware Breakfast Pack!! Complete the online form to enter.
  6. The competition runs from 8 December 2020 00:00:00 to 10 December 2020 23:59:59 on the HomeChoice Facebook page
  7. Entry into the competition is limited to 1 entry per person. The promoter reserves the right, in at its sole discretion, to amend the rules relating to the number of entries per person, depending on the sales channel utilised.
  8. Your entries must reach us before the closing time of the competition specified in clause 6 above. Please note that entry may be through an electronic platform. Although HomeChoice will take all reasonable steps, it will not be liable for any technical problems or any lost, delayed or incorrectly received entries.
  9. There will be 1 winner who will receive a Mellerware Bbreakfast Ppack (consists of a toaster and kettle) (“the Prize”).
  10. The Prize shall not be redeemable for cash and is not transferable, unless we agree otherwise, atin our discretion. We may, atin our discretion, decide to substitute the Prize with similar goods of a similar value.
  11. The winner/s will be selected by random draw, and the process will be overseen by an independent attorney or accountant who will also report on the competition in accordance with all relevant regulatory requirements.
  12. In order to qualify as a winner, you must:
    1. be 18 years or older
    2. not be under debt review or in the process to apply for debt review;
    3. not be a director, member, partner, agent, employee or consultant of the promoter or any supplier of goods or services in connection with the competition, or any other person who directly or indirectly controls or is controlled by the promoter;
    4. not be the spouse, life partner, business partner or associate, or the natural or adopted parent, child, or sibling, of any of the persons specified in (c);
    5. be up to date with all accounts/credit agreements with HomeChoice.
  13. The prize draw will take place within fourteen business days after the closing date of the competition. If the winner’s account is in default at any time from the time of entry to the time of the draw, the winner will immediately be disqualified, and another winner will be selected.
  14. The winner will be contacted via e-mail and/or sms SMS and/or telephone at which point arrangements will be made for the winner/s to receive his/her/their Prize(s). If HomeChoice is not able to contact the winner despite reasonable attempts, within 5 days, it reserves the right to disqualify the winner and select an alternative winner, in which event the initial winner will have no recourse against HomeChoice. Winners, once successfully contacted, will also be announced on the HomeChoice and FinChoice websites and mobi-pages.
  15. Winner may be taxed in terms of applicable tax legislation, and participants who require clarity as to the tax implications hereof should seek a directive from the relevant revenue service/authority.
  16. HomeChoice will use the winner’s name/s and/or photograph/s in any promotional and/or advertising material for the purposes of HomeChoice marketing, unless the winner objects to such use in writing.
  17. The winner will be required to sign a winner’s declaration form and other related documentation as required by law and will also need to provide proof of identity. The winner may not receive the Prize if it is against the law for the winner to receive the Prize.
  18. We may require winners to provide us with such additional information that we may reasonably require in order to process and facilitate their acceptance and/or use of a prize.
  19. The promoter reserves the right, in at its sole discretion, to cancel or suspend any competition or change the rules if errors need to be corrected, or to prevent any party from being unduly prejudiced or favoured in at the reasonable discretion of the promoter.
  20. PLEASE NOTE THAT BY ENTERING INTO THE COMPETITION, YOU MAY STAND A CHANCE TO WIN A PRIZE AND THERE ARE NO GUARANTEES.
  21. If a competition or promotion is cancelled or suspended due to any reasons, all participants or entrants agree to waive any rights that they may have in terms of the competition and acknowledge that they have no recourse against HomeChoice, their employees, agents, partners, suppliers, sponsors or promoters.
  22. Any violation or attempt to violate any of the above rules will result in the immediate disqualification of the transgressor.
  23. The Prize is provided “as is”, and HomeChoice disclaims liability however arising out of your use of the Prize.
  24. You hereby indemnify and hold harmless HomeChoice (including its directors, employees, members, independent contractors, agents, consultants, sub-contractors and other representatives) from any and all direct, indirect or consequential loss or damages suffered as a result of any action or omission relating to this competition and/or the award of any prize.
December 2020 Win your order competition rules
The Promoter
How to enter
The Prize
The Draw
General
  1. HomeChoice (Pty) Limited (“HomeChoice”, “we”, “our” or “us”) is the promoter of this competition.
  2. HomeChoice owns and manages the website located at www.homechoice.co.za (“website”) and the mobi-page at m.homechoice.co.za (“mobi-page”).
  3. By entering this competition, you agree that these competition rules will apply to you and bind you to the extent permitted in law. These rules, should they require interpretation, will be interpreted in accordance with applicable South African laws.
  4. You may obtain a copy of these competition rules from competitions@homechoice.co.za or from the website at www.homechoice.co.za/official-rules.
  5. To be automatically entered into the competition, you must:
    1. be a HomeChoice customer who does not qualify for the ‘Buy Now Pay Later’ promotion (herewith referred to as Qualifying Customers)
    2. place a successful order, which is subsequently despatched during the promotion period
  6. The competition runs from 25 November 2020 00:00:00 to 14 December 2020 23:59:59 on all HomeChoice sales channels.
  7. Entry into the competition is limited to 1 entry per person. The promoter reserves the right, at its sole discretion, to amend the rules relating to the number of entries per person depending on the sales channel utilised.
  8. Your entries must reach us before the closing time of the competition specified in clause 6 above. Please note that entry may be through an electronic platform. Although HomeChoice will take all reasonable steps, it will not be liable for any technical problems or any lost, delayed or incorrectly received entries.
  9. There will be 38 winners who will not be billed for the despatched order which entered them into the draw (“the Prize”). That is, they will win their order for free. If the winning customer has paid cash for the order, they will be reimbursed for the amount paid.
    1. The value of the order does not depend on the customer’s entry into the draw.
  10. The Prize shall not be redeemable for cash and is not transferable unless we agree otherwise at our discretion. We may, at our discretion, decide to substitute the Prize with similar goods of a similar value.
  11. The winners will be selected by random draw, and the process will be overseen by an independent attorney or accountant who will also report on the competition in accordance with all relevant regulatory requirements.
  12. In order to qualify as a winner, you must:
    1. be 18 years or older
    2. not be under debt review or in the process to apply for debt review;
    3. not be a director, member, partner, agent, employee or consultant of the promoter or any supplier of goods or services in connection with the competition or any other person who directly or indirectly controls or is controlled by the promoter;
    4. not be the spouse, life partner, business partner or associate, or the natural or adopted parent, child, or sibling of any of the persons specified in (c);
    5. be up to date with all accounts/credit agreements with HomeChoice/FinChoice and/or FoneChoice
  13. The prize draw will take place weekly during the competition period. If the winner’s account is in default at any time from the time of entry to the time of the draw, the winner will immediately be disqualified, and another winner will be selected.
  14. The winner/s will be contacted via email and/or SMS and/or telephone, at which point arrangements will be made for the winner/s to receive his/her/their Prize(s). If HomeChoice is not able to contact the winner despite reasonable attempts within 5 days, it reserves the right to disqualify the winner and select an alternative winner, in which event the initial winner will have no recourse against HomeChoice. Winners, once successfully contacted, will also be announced on the HomeChoice and FinChoice websites and mobi-pages.
  15. Winner/s may be taxed in terms of applicable tax legislation, and participants who require clarity as to the tax implications hereof should seek a directive from the relevant revenue service/authority.
  16. HomeChoice will use the winner’s name/s and/or photograph/s in any promotional and/or advertising material for the purposes of HomeChoice marketing, unless the winner objects to such use in writing.
  17. The winner will be required to sign a winner’s declaration form and other related documentation as required by law and will also need to provide proof of identity. The winner may not receive the Prize if it is against the law for the winner to receive the Prize.
  18. We may require winners to provide us with such additional information that we may reasonably require in order to process and facilitate their acceptance and/or use of a prize.
  19. The promoter reserves the right, at its sole discretion, to cancel or suspend any competition or change the rules if errors need to be corrected or to prevent any party from being unduly prejudiced or favoured at the reasonable discretion of the promoter.
  20. PLEASE NOTE THAT BY ENTERING INTO THE COMPETITION, YOU MAY STAND A CHANCE TO WIN A PRIZE AND THERE ARE NO GUARANTEES.
  21. If a competition or promotion is cancelled or suspended due to any reasons, all participants or entrants agree to waive any rights that they may have in terms of the competition and acknowledge that they have no recourse against HomeChoice, their employees, agents, partners, suppliers, sponsors or promoters.
  22. Any violation or attempt to violate any of the above rules will result in the immediate disqualification of the transgressor.
  23. The Prize is provided “as is,” and HomeChoice disclaims liability however arising out of your use of the Prize.
  24. You hereby indemnify and hold harmless HomeChoice (including its directors, employees, members, independent contractors, agents, consultants, sub-contractors and other representatives) from any and all direct, indirect or consequential loss or damages suffered as a result of any action or omission relating to this competition and/or the award of any prize.

    1. be a HomeChoice customer who does not qualify for the ‘Buy Now Pay Later’ promotion (herewith referred to as Qualifying Customers)
    2. place a successful order, which is subsequently despatched during the promotion period
  6. The competition runs from 28 October 2020 00:00:00 to 24 November 2020 23:59:59 on all HomeChoice sales channels.
  7. Entry into the competition is limited to 1 entry per person. The promoter reserves the right, at its sole discretion, to amend the rules relating to the number of entries per person depending on the sales channel utilised.
  8. Your entries must reach us before the closing time of the competition specified in clause 6 above. Please note that entry may be through an electronic platform. Although HomeChoice will take all reasonable steps, it will not be liable for any technical problems or any lost, delayed or incorrectly received entries.
  9. There will be 50 winners who will not be billed for the despatched order which entered them into the draw (“the Prize”). That is, they will win their order for free. If the winning customer has paid cash for the order, they will be reimbursed for the amount paid.
    • The value of the order does not depend on the customer’s entry into the draw.
  10. The Prize shall not be redeemable for cash and is not transferable unless we agree otherwise at our discretion. We may, at our discretion, decide to substitute the Prize with similar goods of a similar value.
  11. The winners will be selected by random draw, and the process will be overseen by an independent attorney or accountant who will also report on the competition in accordance with all relevant regulatory requirements.
  12. In order to qualify as a winner, you must:
    1. be 18 years or older
    2. not be under debt review or in the process to apply for debt review;
    3. not be a director, member, partner, agent, employee or consultant of the promoter or any supplier of goods or services in connection with the competition or any other person who directly or indirectly controls or is controlled by the promoter;
    4. not be the spouse, life partner, business partner or associate, or the natural or adopted parent, child, or sibling of any of the persons specified in (c);
    5. be up to date with all accounts/credit agreements with HomeChoice/FinChoice and/or FoneChoice
  13. The prize draw will take place within fourteen business days after the closing date of the competition. If the winner’s account is in default at any time from the time of entry to the time of the draw, the winner will immediately be disqualified, and another winner will be selected.
  14. The winner/s will be contacted via email and/or SMS and/or telephone, at which point arrangements will be made for the winner/s to receive his/her/their Prize(s). If HomeChoice is not able to contact the winner despite reasonable attempts within 5 days, it reserves the right to disqualify the winner and select an alternative winner, in which event the initial winner will have no recourse against HomeChoice. Winners, once successfully contacted, will also be announced on the HomeChoice and FinChoice websites and mobi-pages.
  15. Winner/s may be taxed in terms of applicable tax legislation, and participants who require clarity as to the tax implications hereof should seek a directive from the relevant revenue service/authority.
  16. HomeChoice will use the winner’s name/s and/or photograph/s in any promotional and/or advertising material for the purposes of HomeChoice marketing, unless the winner objects to such use in writing.
  17. The winner will be required to sign a winner’s declaration form and other related documentation as required by law and will also need to provide proof of identity. The winner may not receive the Prize if it is against the law for the winner to receive the Prize.
  18. We may require winners to provide us with such additional information that we may reasonably require in order to process and facilitate their acceptance and/or use of a prize.
  19. The promoter reserves the right, at its sole discretion, to cancel or suspend any competition or change the rules if errors need to be corrected or to prevent any party from being unduly prejudiced or favoured at the reasonable discretion of the promoter.
  20. PLEASE NOTE THAT BY ENTERING INTO THE COMPETITION, YOU MAY STAND A CHANCE TO WIN A PRIZE AND THERE ARE NO GUARANTEES.
  21. If a competition or promotion is cancelled or suspended due to any reasons, all participants or entrants agree to waive any rights that they may have in terms of the competition and acknowledge that they have no recourse against HomeChoice, their employees, agents, partners, suppliers, sponsors or promoters.
  22. Any violation or attempt to violate any of the above rules will result in the immediate disqualification of the transgressor.

October 2020 Win R1 000 000 Competition Rules
The Promoters
How to enter
The Prize
The Draw
General
  1. HomeChoice (Pty) Limited (“HomeChoice”) is the promoter of this competition in conjunction with FinChoice Africa Limited (both referred to as “FinChoice ”) (collectively referred to as “the Promoters”, “we”, “our” or “us”).
  2. HomeChoice owns and manages the website located at www.homechoice.co.za (“website”) and the mobi-site at m.homechoice.co.za (“mobi-site”).
  3. FinChoice owns and manages the website located at www.finchoice.co.za (“website”) and the mobi-site at www.finchoice.mobi (“mobi-site”).
  4. By entering this competition, you agree that these competition rules will apply to you and bind you to the extent permitted in law. These rules, should they require interpretation, will be interpreted in accordance with applicable South African laws.
  5. You may obtain a copy of these competition rules as follows:
    1. HomeChoice customers: from competitions@homechoice.co.za or from the website at www.homechoice.co.za/official-rules.
    2. FinChoice customers: from the mobi-site www.finchoice.mobi/Home/Terms section Grand Prize Draw.
  6. To be automatically entered into the competition:
    • HomeChoice Customers:
      1. You will receive 1 (one) entry for every successfully placed order during the competition period, provided that the order is subsequently successfully dispatched.
      2. For orders successfully placed via the HomeChoice website you will receive 2 (two) entries, provided that the order is subsequently successfully dispatched.
      3. Pay an extra instalment on your account during the competition period and you will receive 5 (five) entries to the draw, provided that your account is up to date and not in arrears.
      4. If your account has been in arrears for 1 (one) month or less, and you settle the full arrears amount during the competition period, you will receive 1 (one) entry into the draw.
    • FinChoice Customers who:
      1. Successfully take a New Loan or Reloan
      2. Successfully activate a MobiMoney facility
      3. Successfully withdraw from your MobiMoney facility
  7. The competition runs from 30 September 2020 00:00:00 to 27 October 2020 23:59:59 on all HomeChoice and FinChoice channels.
  8. Entry into the competition:
    1. HomeChoice Customers: are limited to 5 entries per person, unless entries are received via the website or mobi-site in which case a maximum of 10 entries per person are allowed.
    2. FinChoice Customers: are limited to 5 entries per person, unless entries are received via the website or mobi-site in which case a maximum of 10 entries per person are allowed.
    The Promoters reserve the right, in their sole discretion, to amend the rules relating to the number of entries per person depending on the channel of entry utilised.
  9. Your entries must reach us before the closing time of the competition specified in clause 8 above. Please note that entry may be through an electronic platform. Although the Promoters will take all reasonable steps, we will not be liable for any technical problems or any lost, delayed or incorrectly received entries.
  10. There will be 1 (one) winner who will receive R1 000 000 (one million rands only) (“the Prize”) which will be paid out in five equal disbursements of R200,000 (two hundred thousand rand) over a 5-year period (the "Prize"), the first payment to be made in November 2020 and annually thereafter.
  11. The Prize shall not be redeemable for any other item and is not transferable, unless we agree otherwise in our discretion. We may, in our discretion, decide to substitute the Prize with goods of a similar value.
  12. The winner will be selected by random draw and the process will be overseen by an independent attorney or accountant who will also report on the competition in accordance with all relevant regulatory requirements.
  13. In order to qualify as a winner, you must:
    1. be 18 years or older
    2. not be under debt review or in the process of applying for debt review;
    3. not be a director, member, partner, agent, employee or consultant of the Promoters or any supplier of goods or services in connection with the competition, or any other person who directly or indirectly controls or is controlled by the Promoters;
    4. not be the spouse, life partner, business partner or associate, or the natural or adopted parent, child, or sibling, of any of the persons specified in (c);
    5. be up to date with all accounts/credit agreements with HomeChoice and FinChoice
  14. The prize draw will take place within 14 business days after the closing date of the competition. If the winner’s account is in default at any time from the time of entry to the time of the draw, the winner will immediately be disqualified and the prize will be awarded to an alternative winner. If none of the winner(s) or alternative winners drawn qualify to receive the Prize, we may conduct a new draw at our discretion.
  15. The winner will be contacted via e-mail and/or sms and/or telephone at which point arrangements will be made for the winner to receive his/her Prize. If the Promoters are not able to contact the winner within 5 (five) working days, despite reasonable attempts, we reserve the right to disqualify the winner and award the Prize to an alternative winner, in which event the initial winner will have no recourse against the Promoters. The winner, once successfully contacted, will also be announced on the HomeChoice and/or FinChoice websites and mobi-sites.

  20. The Promoters reserve the right, in their sole discretion, to cancel or suspend any competition or change the rules if errors need to be corrected, or to prevent any party from being unduly prejudiced or favoured in the reasonable discretion of the Promoters.

  10. Customers who return their order for any reason will forfeit their right to the benefit.
  11. In this instance, the gift will be treated as a credit purchase on the date as specified in the notice. The standard HomeChoice credit terms and conditions, including credit costs, will apply to it.
  12. A customer will forfeit his or her right to the benefit associated with the promotion if he or she is (a) under debt review or in the process to apply for debt review; or (b) a director, member, partner, agent, employee or consultant of the promoter or any supplier of goods or services in connection with the promotional offer, or any other person who directly or indirectly controls or is controlled by the promoter; and/or (c) the spouse, life partner, business partner or associate, or the natural or adopted parent, child, or sibling, of any of the persons specified in (b).

  14. If the promotional offer is cancelled or suspended due to any reasons, all qualifying customers agree to waive any rights that they may have in terms of the promotional offer and acknowledge that they have no recourse against HomeChoice, their employees, agents, partners, suppliers, sponsors or promoters.

  3. By entering this competition, you agree that these competition rules will apply to you and bind you to the extent permitted in law. These rules, should they require interpretation, will be interpreted in accordance with applicable South African laws.
  4. You can obtain a copy of these competition rules from competitions@homechoice.co.za or from the website at www.homechoice.co.za/official-rules.
  5. To be automatically entered into the competition you must:
    1. Post a picture of your baby and a comment on our Facebook or Instagram post
  6. The competition runs from 31 August 00:00:00 to 4 September 2020 23:59:59 on all HomeChoice social media pages.
  7. Entry into the competition is limited to 1 entry per person. The promoter reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to amend the rules relating to the number of entries per person depending on the sales channel utilised.
  8. Your entries must reach us before the closing time of the competition specified in clause 6 above. Please note that entry may be through an electronic platform. Although HomeChoice will take all reasonable steps, it will not be liable for any technical problems or any lost, delayed or incorrectly received entries.
  9. There will be 1 winner who will receive a Lush Baby Thula Duvet set (“the Prize”).
  10. The Prize shall not be redeemable for cash and is not transferable, unless we agree otherwise in our discretion. We may, in our discretion, decide to substitute the Prize with similar goods of a similar value.
  11. The winner will be selected by random draw and the process will be overseen by an independent attorney or accountant who will also report on the competition in accordance with all relevant regulatory requirements.
  12. In order to qualify as a winner, you must:
    1. be 18 years or older;
    2. not be under debt review or in the process of applying for debt review;
    3. not be a director, member, partner, agent, employee or consultant of the promoter or any supplier of goods or services in connection with the competition, or any other person who directly or indirectly controls or is controlled by the promoter;
    4. not be the spouse, life partner, business partner or associate, or the natural or adopted parent, child, or sibling, of any of the persons specified in (c);
    5. be up to date with all accounts/credit agreements with HomeChoice.
  13. The prize draw will take place within 14 business days after the closing date of the competition. If the winner’s account is in default at any time from the time of entry to the time of the draw, the winner will immediately be disqualified, and another winner will be selected.
  14. The winner will be contacted via e-mail and/or sms and/or telephone at which point arrangements will be made for the winner/s to receive his/her/their Prize(s). If HomeChoice is not able to contact the winner despite reasonable attempts, within 5 days, it reserves the right to disqualify the winner and select an alternative winner, in which event the initial winner will have no recourse against HomeChoice. Winners, once successfully contacted, will also be announced on the HomeChoice websites and mobi-pages.
  15. Winner/s may be taxed in terms of applicable tax legislation and participants who require clarity as to the tax implications hereof should seek a directive from the relevant revenue service/authority.
  16. HomeChoice will use the winner’s name/s and/or photograph/s in any promotional and/or advertising material for the purposes of HomeChoice marketing, unless the winner objects to such use in writing.
  17. The winner will be required to sign a winner’s declaration form and other related documentation as required by law and will also need to provide proof of identity. The winner may not receive the Prize if it is against the law for the winner to receive the Prize.
  18. We may require the winner/s to provide us with such additional information that we may reasonably require in order to process and facilitate their acceptance and/or use of a prize.
  19. The promoter reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to cancel or suspend any competition or change the rules if errors need to be corrected, or to prevent any party from being unduly prejudiced or favoured in the reasonable discretion of the promoter.
  20. PLEASE NOTE THAT BY ENTERING INTO THE COMPETITION YOU MAY STAND A CHANCE TO WIN A PRIZE AND THERE ARE NO GUARANTEES.
  21. If a competition or promotion is cancelled or suspended due to any reasons, all participants or entrants agree to waive any rights that they may have in terms of the competition and acknowledge that they have no recourse against HomeChoice, their employees, agents, partners, suppliers, sponsors or promoters.

  1. HomeChoice (Pty) Limited (“HomeChoice”, “we”, “our” or “us”) is the promoter of this competition.
  2. HomeChoice owns and manages the website located at www.homechoice.co.za (“website”) and the mobi-page at m.homechoice.co.za (“mobi-page”).
  3. By entering this competition, you agree that these competition rules will apply to you and bind you to the extent permitted in law. These rules, should they require interpretation, will be interpreted in accordance with applicable South African laws.
  4. You may obtain a copy of these competition rules from competitions@homechoice.co.za or from the website at www.homechoice.co.za/official-rules
  5. To be automatically entered into the competition you must:
    1. Place an order from any of our sales channels during the promotion period
  6. The competition runs from 30 May 2020 00:00:00 to 25 June 2020 23:59:59 on all HomeChoice sales channels.
  7. Entry into the competition is limited to 1 entry per person. The promoter reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to amend the rules relating to the number of entries per person depending on the sales channel utilized.
  8. Your entries must reach us before the closing time of the competition specified in clause 6 above. Please note that entry may be through an electronic platform. Although HomeChoice will take all reasonable steps, it will not be liable for any technical problems or any lost, delayed or incorrectly received entries.
  9. There will be 30 winner/s who will receive the value of their order free (“the Prize”).
    • 9.1. Winning customers will not be billed for the passed order which entered them into the draw (The Prize). That is, they will win their order for free. If the winning customer has paid cash for the order, they will be reimbursed for the amount paid.
    • 9.2. The value of the order does not depend on the customer’s entry into the draw.
  10. The Prize is not transferable, unless we agree otherwise in our discretion. We may in our discretion decide to substitute the Prize with similar goods of a similar value.
  11. The winners will be selected by random draw and the process will be overseen by an independent attorney or accountant who will also report on the competition in accordance with all relevant regulatory requirements.
  12. In order to qualify as a winner, you must:
    1. be 18 years or older
    2. not be under debt review or in the process to apply for debt review;
    3. not be a director, member, partner, agent, employee or consultant of the promoter or any supplier of goods or services in connection with the competition, or any other person who directly or indirectly controls or is controlled by the promoter;
    4. not be the spouse, life partner, business partner or associate, or the natural or adopted parent, child, or sibling, of any of the persons specified in (c);
    5. be up to date with all accounts/credit agreements with HomeChoice.
  13. The prize draw will take place within fourteen business days after the closing date of the competition. If the winner’s account is in default at any time from the time of entry to the time of the draw, the winner will immediately be disqualified, and another winner will be selected.
  14. The winners will be contacted via e-mail and/or sms and/or telephone at which point arrangements will be made for the winner/s to receive his/her/their Prize(s). If HomeChoice is not able to contact the winner despite reasonable attempts, within 5 days, it reserves the right to disqualify the winner and select an alternative winner, in which event the initial winner will have no recourse against HomeChoice. Winners, once successfully contacted, will also be announced on the HomeChoice and FinChoice websites and mobi-pages.
  15. Winner/s may be taxed in terms of applicable tax legislation and participants who require clarity as to the tax implications hereof should seek a directive from the relevant revenue service/authority.
  16. HomeChoice will use the winner’s name/s and/or photograph/s in any promotional and/or advertising material for the purposes of HomeChoice marketing, unless the winner objects to such use in writing.
  17. The winner will be required to sign a winner’s declaration form and other related documentation as required by law and will also need to provide proof of identity. The winner may not receive the Prize if it is against the law for the winner to receive the Prize.
  18. We may require winners to provide us with such additional information that we may reasonably require in order to process and facilitate their acceptance and/or use of a prize.
  19. The promoter reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to cancel or suspend any competition or change the rules if errors need to be corrected, or to prevent any party from being unduly prejudiced or favoured in the reasonable discretion of the promoter.
  20. PLEASE NOTE THAT BY ENTERING INTO THE COMPETITION YOU MAY STAND A CHANCE TO WIN A PRIZE AND THERE ARE NO GUARANTEES.
  21. If a competition or promotion is cancelled or suspended due to any reasons, all participants or entrants agree to waive any rights that they may have in terms of the competition and acknowledge that they have no recourse against HomeChoice, their employees, agents, partners, suppliers, sponsors or promoters.
  22. Any violation or attempt to violate any of the above rules will result in the immediate disqualification of the transgressor.
  23. The Prize is provided “as is” and HomeChoice disclaims liability however arising out of your use of the Prize.
  24. You hereby indemnify and hold harmless HomeChoice (including its directors, employees, members, independent contractors, agents, consultants, sub-contractors and other representatives) from any and all direct, indirect or consequential loss or damages suffered as a result of any action or omission relating to this competition and/or the award of any prize.

    1. Place an order via our website
    will receive a R100 discount if they enter the code 4YOU100 for their first online order that is successfully placed during the promotion period.

  8. HomeChoice reserves the right to replace the voucher with a voucher of a similar value should this be required due to items being out of stock or for any other reason whatsoever at their sole discretion.
  9. Customers who return their order for any reason will forfeit their right to the voucher.
  10. A customer will forfeit his or her right to the voucher associated with the promotion if he or she is:
    1. under debt review or in the process to apply for debt review
    2. a director, member, partner, agent, employee or consultant of the promoter or any supplier of goods or services in connection with the promotional offer, or any other person who directly or indirectly controls or is controlled by the promoter;
    3. the spouse, life partner, business partner or associate, or the natural or adopted parent, child, or sibling, of any of the persons specified in (b).
  11. The promoter reserves the right, at its sole discretion, to cancel or suspend any promotional offer if errors need to be corrected, or to prevent any party from being unduly prejudiced or favoured at the discretion of the promotor.
  12. If the promotional offer is cancelled or suspended due to any reasons, all qualifying customers agree to waive any rights that they may have in terms of the promotional offer and acknowledge that they have no recourse against HomeChoice, their employees, agents, partners, suppliers, sponsors or promoters.
